::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus stumbles back as Teltoli's flame hits him. He rolls to the 
left, grabbing Iron Raptor by the neck and pressing his launcher 
against her back. "Allright, maximals. Don't move or she dies."

Suddenly a blur flies out from the direction of the Ark, smashing
into 
Zardus and sending him and the blur (Prowl) through several trees and 
into a boulder. Zardus pulls the trigger on his launcher and it hits 
Prowl in the stomach, throwing the maximal to the ground.

Zardus growls, discarding the now-empty launcher, stands up, and
walks 
over to Prowl, lowering his gun to the maximal's head.

"How dumb of you. Giving your life for another." He says, ready to 
blast Prowl's head to smith
